oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The World Atlas of Language Structures Online
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WALS is a large database of structural (phonological, grammatical, lexical) properties of languages gathered from descriptive materials (such as reference grammars) by a team of more than 40 authors (many of them the leading authorities on the subject).
